title: A Story of discovery: why plants bend towards light
creator_credit: Charles L. Finance and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Describes the contribution of Darwin, Boysen-Jensen, Paal and Went in establishing the processes which cause plants to react and bend towards the light.
